code: import React from'react';import Profile2 from'../../assets/me/Profile2.png';import{Container,Image,Col,Row}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function About(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"about-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{className:"about-column",xs:12,md:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"About Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:Profile2,width:"180",height:"171",alt:"profile picture",roundedCircle:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{xs:12,md:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about-text",children:"My name is Marilyn and this portoflio showcases what I have learned as a web developer student.
